description:
This module aims to provide a hands-on learning
opportunity through the use of an easy-to-understand tool
for students to address a wide range of supply chain
management (SCM) problems. The tool allows students to
model and focus on management decision analysis and
use KPIs for operational, customer and financial
performance measurement and decision-making.
The module covers supply chain simulation and
optimization examples via developing and building models
and evaluating KPIs, and discusses how to use these
models and their simulation and optimization results to
improve management decision-making.
title: Modelling for Supply Chain Optimization
